name: Space Story (itch)
description:
Space Story

Is a single player sci-fi horror game developed by 1 man.

The game is really short (if u can find all 3 key cards) 
and still needs some work here and there.
The players job is to find the 3 key cards so the space station can be turned on again. But are u alone?... and where is the key cards?

Dont think its going to be easy because it wont!

The only reason its on here is because i need feedback so i can make it better. So please leave a comment. 

I will try to update the game as much as possible. use the app https://itch.io/app too get the updates automaticly. 

Controls:
W Key: To walk forward 
S Key: To walk backwards
D Key: To walk to the left
A Key: To walk to the right 
F Key: To toggle flashlight on/off
J Key: To open journal
Tab key: To open your inventory
Esc key: To Pause/Open main menu
use the mouse to look around

Only on Windows 64-bit
